page.title: 10CRAFTWORK AROUND RINGSTEAD
page.content: HARMER POTTERY near St.Mary's Church manufacture the complete product on site including the design,firing, glazing etc.Most is sold locally at Craft Shows,Fetes etc.and products include vases,dishes and pots. The work is facilitated by piped gas which is available here though in most of the area gas is only available in portable cylinders. RINGSTEAD GALLERY sells pictures, mostly painted by local artists, and holds exhibitions and does framing and cleaning of pictures. A LOCAL GAMEKEEPER produces some wrought iron work (weather vanes, hanging baskets and flower containers) largely as a hobby.
